title: Purdey
content:
This is probably easy but im having problem finding it. Im greatfull for all the help I can get.  
P.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typeface.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061201165913/http:/typophile.com/files/typeface_3.jpg) | 238.87 KB |
author: plojel

comments.content:
It looks like Myriad Pro to me. I believe the heavy weight face is Bold Condensed or Black Condensed, and the lighter weight is Condensed.

Try Adobe:  
 [http://www.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P\_1706.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061201165913/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1706.html)
Myriad Pro works perfect! Thank you for your assistance.
